relation.text: deceased in two Inches under the Left Pap , of which in three days
9th of January of which upon the Testimony of the Witnesses was found
was Indicted for Robing John Wise of St. Giles in the Fields , on the 10th of December
took his Trial , for that he , together with one Jane Rand , servant to Mr. Bethel in Cornhil , on the 4th of December
end of November last , which appeared
